item.title: Bosses are engaging in ‘subtle sabotage’ and giving their employees ‘office housework’. Here’s how to spot workplace gaslighting
item.description: Bosses are engaging in subtle forms of bullying to control their employeees, and giving them 'office housework' to undermine them.

item.description: Boeing demanded in 2013 that machinists drop their pension plan as part of an agreement to build a new model of the 777 jetliner in Washington state.

item.title: Georgia's election forces voters to choose between a future with Russia or Europe
item.description: Georgia — like other former Soviet republics — has found itself between Russia and the West, with competing forces pulling it in either direction.
